meanings.sent1: She placed her hands on her bodysides.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's bodysides carefully.
meanings.sent3: When he tickled her bodysides, she burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements flowed gracefully from her bodysides.
meanings.sent5: The bodysides of the car were dented in the accident.

meanings.definition: The outer panels of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic painted the bodysides of the car.
meanings.sent2: The shiny bodysides of the truck gleamed in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon tried to climb up the bodysides of the parked car.
meanings.sent4: The advertisement featured the sleek bodysides of the new model.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti artist decorated the bodysides of the bus with colorful designs.
